titles.title: O Lamb Of God Still Keep Me (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lamb of God still keep me Close to Thy wounded side 'Tis only there in safety And peace I can abide{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What foes and snares surround me What lusts and fears within The grace that sought and found me Alone can keep me clean{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}'Tis only in Thee hiding I feel myself secure Only in Thee abiding The conflict can endure{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thine arm the victory gaineth O'er every hateful foe Thy love my heart sustaineth In all its care and woe{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Soon shall my eyes behold Thee With rapture face to face One half hath not been told me Of all Thy power and grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy beauty Lord and glory The wonders of Thy love Shall be the endless story Of all Thy saints above{/lang-eng}
